FuncDef: This command specifies the maximum number of active flows to maintain in the flow cache table.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the maximum number of entries maintained in the cflowd cache. The number depends on the CPM version. Values-For the 7450 ESS and 7750 SR (cfm-xp, SF/CPM3):|1000 to 250000, For the 7450 ESS and 7750 SR (CPM4 or CPM5):|1000 to 1000000 , For the 7950 XRS:|1000 to 1500000. ParamDefault: Default- For the 7450 ESS and 7750 SR:65536 (64K)
For the 7950 XRS:500000
